titles.title: Workplace Safety Improvement Act
To amend the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Workforce Protections.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

bill.summary: 7/27/2000--Introduced. Workplace Safety Improvement Act - Amends the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 (OSHA) to prohibit citing an employer for a violation on a multi-employer work site if the employer has: (1) not created the condition that caused the violation; (2) no employees exposed to the violation; or (3) not assumed responsibility for ensuring compliance by other employers on the work site.
